title: Ping checker prior to launching
body:
Not sure if this has been posted or is actually somewhere to check in LOL, but what about a button you can press to tell you your ping prior to loading the game?
I speedtest prior and it says ping 15, however I join a game its 300 in loading screen alone occasionally. I wouldnt join a game if I knew it was that high currently

replies.body: It's called a custom game join a custom game with just yourself check your ping then you can dc without being penalized.

Forget ping checks, if the server recognises your ping too high they should not even allow you to join, fuck it.

I just got out of a game that mid DC'd more often than they were in the game, complaining of high ping and went 0/9. Yet another lose for something I could do nothing about. They really need to do something to stop shit happening that makes a lose that is not your fault.
Even thats not a bad idea. just something to stop people loading prior. get everyone to have to click a button to test before queing, if its shit they cant queue

ANYTHING is better than the current crop of shit I am facing. What we really need is to implement a system that gives LP based on your personal play. I decided last game to go support, something different, Vayne in the meantime won't stop farming for CS and was behind all game, when players ganked our lane, she farmed CS. When someone tanked the tower, she farmed CS.

Funny though, she was behind all game in CS. There is no way we can stop these players playing, Riot will always let anyone join, but we need a system that puts the shit with the shit, not just a win lose situation.
